item.description: The Summit View Meetinghouse and Banquet Facility provides for a quaint and charming gathering spot along rte. 5 across the Connceticut River. On Friday evenings the Summit View holds free outdoor concerts at their Pavilion. From 5:30 to 8:30p.m. a BBQ buffet is provided. All food and drinks must be purchased on the premises. Concerts begin at 6:30p.m. Union-jack is a high energy mainstream rock band. Their music is quite diversified in style, but holds a theme that people are drawn to. This group strives to keep the audience dancing and involved to performing songs from the best of Rock, Pop and Alternative styles of the present and past. With nothing less then a professional persona and a great stage presence, they can guarantee that a great night of entertainment will be found where ever Union-jack is on the Marquee.
item.how_to_find_us: Ex: I'll be the guy in the back with a Meetup t-shirt
item.name: Free Outoor Concert: Union -jack
